detail_desc: Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut style with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front, a loop at the back and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.

Blouse in airy, slub-weave cotton with contrasting colour embroidery around the neckline and on the sleeves. V-shaped opening at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x18x28.5 cm.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide elastic waistband. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.3 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a back pocket.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a wide, gathered neckline front and back and lace sections over the shoulders.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a print on one leg and a contrasting colour waist panel.
Pull-on trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with a ribbed waistband, fake fly with a button at the front, fake front pockets and open back pockets.
Sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with pleats at the front of the neckline, an opening with a button at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Set with a shirt and sweater vest in cotton. Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a detachable bow tie with a plastic fastener. V-neck sweater vest in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless chiffon dress with elastication around the neckline, an elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with vertical flounces. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with a drawstring, and a V-shaped opening at the front.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a zip at the top, lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with ties at the front and flared sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.
Rib-knit jumper in soft chenille yarn. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dungaree dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with a square neckline, wide shoulder straps and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in soft leather with a concealed zip down the front that ends in a slit. Discreet side pockets. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, textured cotton knit with visible buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Pool shoes in printed imitation leather with moulded soles that are fluted underneath.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder, decorative flatlock seams at the front, twisted seams at the sides and slits at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif, opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trim at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Padded, quilted parka in woven fabric with a padded, mesh-lined drawstring hood. Concealed zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, diagonal chest pocket with a concealed press-stud, front flap pockets with press-studs and concealed side pockets. Ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Trainers in mesh with lacing at the front and grosgrain loops front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Trenchcoat in soft imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, soft lapels and fixed shoulder tabs. Loose yoke front and back, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners.
Calf-length kaftan in an airy viscose weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the top. Concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in slightly stretchy cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and slim, straight legs.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.

Knee-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in a contrasting colour, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in sturdy brocade made from recycled polyester containing glittery threads. Draping over the bust with a large, decorative bow, a seam under the bust and a high, close-fitting waist with pleats for added volume. Concealed zip in one side. Shaped, sturdy skirt with concealed pockets in the side seams. Silicone trim at the top of the dress for best fit and detachable, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Longjohns in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable, lace-covered shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch imitation suede with an extended waistband and press-stud, zip fly,  decorative seams and raw-edge hems.
Vest top in soft ribbed jersey.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves, high slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with a lace-covered V-neck at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Leggings in soft, rib-knit merino wool with a high elasticated drawstring waist and elasticated knit trims at the hems.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt pockets with a decorative button at the back. Legs with creases.
Top in soft fabric with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.

Short dress in cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length balloon sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Round, ribbed neckline and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long, sleeveless dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Stretch twill treggings in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and decorations on the legs.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.
Sandals in cotton canvas with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.

Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and reflective details. Tapered legs with mesh stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour and a zip at the hems.

Jacquard-patterned blouse in cotton poplin with inset lace trims, a stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, a sewn-in tie belt at the front and straight, wide legs.
Cropped, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a drawstring at the hem. Ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing on the sleeves and hem. Rounded hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and elbow patches in a contrasting colour.
Vest top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and a racer back. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
